Name: Losari Beach
Description: Losari beach is a must-visit place during your stay in Makassar. This beach is very famous among local people and visitors, where you can find several uniqueness of the place. You won’t find sandy beaches with waves like in other beaches, instead you will see an expanse of blue sea with concrete barrier around. The main attraction of this place is that you can enjoy various local culinary dishes while fishing, chatting, or simply gathering with your family.

Name: Rotterdam Fort
Description: Rotterdam fort, a historical heritage from Gowa-Tallo kingdom that was built in 1545. This place is also a home of a museum with more than 4000 collections, including ethnography collection. Its ancient building is now popular for photography site.

Name: Taka Bonerate Marine Park
Description: Taka Bonerate marine park is located in Selayar islands. This particular tourism site is a favorite place for water sport enthusiasts. Enjoy the diversity of hundreds variety of fishes and turtles while your snorkel and dive into the water.

Name: Tanjung Bira
Description: Located in secluded place, Tanjung Bira makes one of the best tourist destinations to relax and run from those businesses in the city. This beach is famous for its pure white sand and clear blue seawater. Visitors can enjoy various activity in the beach including sunbathing, snorkeling, diving, swimming, or simply enjoying the beautiful beach panorama and sunset.

Name: Bantimurung National Park
Description: Located 45 km from the city center of Makassar, Bantimurung national park has an area of 43.759 acres and butterfly as its icon. This national park covers limestone hills, waterfalls and caves. However, the main attraction of the place is visitors can see hundreds collections of butterfly, enjoy waterfall, flying fox, and swimming in the pool.

Name: MaxOneHotels at Resort Makassar
Description: Located in Makassar and with Losari Beach reachable within 8 km, MaxOneHotels at Resort Makassar provides express check-in and check-out, rooms, a bar, free WiFi throughout the property and a garden. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The property features an outdoor pool, indoor pool, fitness centre and restaurant.All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At MaxOneHotels at Resort Makassar every room comes with air conditioning and a private bathroom.Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.MaxOneHotels at Resort Makassar offers a terrace.Panakkukang Mall is 2.7 km from the hotel, while Bugis Water Park is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Sultan Hasanuddin International, 18 km from MaxOneHotels at Resort Makassar, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Harper Perintis by ASTON
Description: Located in Makassar, 18 km from Losari Beach, Harper Perintis by ASTON provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a fitness centre and a bar. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with an outdoor pool. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel every room comes with a wardrobe and a private bathroom.A continental breakfast is available daily at Harper Perintis by ASTON.The accommodation offers a sun terrace.Panakkukang Mall is 12 km from Harper Perintis by ASTON, while Bugis Water Park is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Sultan Hasanuddin International, 5 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: The Rinra
Description: One of our top picks in Makassar.  Offering stylish and modern atmosphere, The Rinra is set in Makassar in the South Sulawesi Region. Guests can choose to relax on a sun terrace. After a busy day you can enjoy a meal or a barbecue at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available on site.The rooms offers views of the sea or the city. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and slippers in the private bathroom.There is a 24-hour front desk and shops at the property for your convenience.The Rinra also offers car hire. The nearest airport is Hasanuddin Airport, 19 km from the property.
